title: The distance between any two rehab/composite buildings shall not be less than 6 m for the height up
clause_text: The distance between any two rehab/composite buildings shall not be less than 6 m for the height up to 32 m and for the building with height more than 32 m the open spaces shall be as per Regulation No 41(5).
section: RELAXATION IN BUILDING AND OTHER REQUIREMENTS:
